Nana launches a magic boomerang in the designated direction. Each time the boomerange hits an enemy, it will deal 220 (+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slow enemies by 40% for 1.5s. The first enemy takes full damage, the next one takes 20% less damge, up to 60% less damage.

Nana summons Molina to the designated area. After a short delay, Molina locks onto an enemy hero, chases them, and morphs them, dealing 250 (+50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slowing them by 50% for 1.5s. Reduces Magic Defense of transformed heroes by 25%.

Nana summons Molina to attack the designated area 3 times. Each attack deals 400 (+180% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies in the area and slows them by 50% for 2s. If Molina Blitz hits a single enemy continously, that enemy will be stunned for 1s.

Natalia  deals extra 15% damage wehn attacking enemies from behind. 

If Natalia  is in bush for 2s without taking or dealing damage, she will eneter Conceal State. 5s after leaving bush or dealing damage will make her appear. Under Conceal State, her Movement Speed is increased by 20% and her next Basic Attack will take her to the behind of enemies and deal extra 25% damage, silencing them for 1s.
Natalia dashes forward, dealing 250 (+50% Total Physical ATK)  points of Physical Damage to enemies along the path. This skill can be cast again within a short period of tiem after hitting an enemy.

Natalia casts a smoke bomb that lasts 4s on the current spot. In the smoke, enemies will be slowed by 55%. Meanwhile, Natalia increases her Attack Speed by 30% and becomes immune to all Basic Attacks.

Natalia performs multiple attacks forward continuously, each attack dealing 150 (+70% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage and slowing enemies by 40%.
Using Claw Dash in this duration allows Natalia to cancel the skill.
Odette concentrates energy to summon a swan to attack enemies, dealing 250 (+150% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slowing them by 70%. Lasts 2s.

Odette fires a magic energy ball forward, dealing Magic Damage to enemies and immobilizing them for 2s. After the ball has reached either its Max range or hit a target, two extra energy balls will strike out to the sides, dealing 250 (50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damageand immobilizing them for 2s.

Odette gathers energy and deals Continuous Damage to enemies within the area. Deals 240 (+120% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies every 0.5s. Lasts 5s. The field also enhances rebounding speed and number of rebounds of Lakeshare Ambience. Reduces damage taken by 50% while active. Slows enemies by 90%, which decays over time. Lasts 2s.
After casting a skill, Odette's next Basic Attack or Skill will also cast a sound wave that rebounds between enemies, dealing 144-200 (+50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage.

Passive: Permanently increases 30 points of Magic Attack.

Active: Pharsa turns to a mist around Verri, flying over terrain for 5s. Once controlled, this state will end immediately.
Pharsa flies into mid-air and launches a continuous air raid on the target area in the next 13s, dealing 500 (+160% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies in the area.
Pharsa releases magic energy in the target direction, dealing 350 (+130% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to the enemies hit.
Every once in a while, Verri enters the Hunting State, during which Pharsa deals 300 (+80% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies and slows them by 75% for 1.5s.

Rafaela summons Holy Light to regenerate 370 (+50% Total Magic Power) HP for herself and the most-injured nearby ally. Regenerates 90 (+25% Total Magic Power) HP for other nearby allied heroes. Increases their Movement Speed by 50% within the following 1s.
Rafaela uses the power of Holy Light to punish enemies in front of her, dealing 460 (+120% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and stunning them for 1.5s, at the same time, slowing them by 40%.

Rafaela uses the power of Holy Light to deal 225 (+120% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to the three nearest enemies, revealing them for a short period of time and slowing them by 40% for 1.5s. If this skill hits the same target within 5s, then the damage of this skill will increase by 20%. Stacks up to 3 times.

Rafaela penalizes the target who has killed her (the target should be within a certain range). She charges for 2s and then sends the penalization power to the target, dealing True Damage equal to 20% of the target's Max HP. It can be blocked by other enemy heroes. This skill works only on enemy heroes.
Roger increases his Movement Speed by 50% for 2.5s.

Roger lunges forward and turns into a wolf, dealing 200 (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage and slowing enemies by 90%. Lasts 0.8s.

Passive: In Wolf form, Roger increases 40 Points of Physical and Magic Defense and increases his Movement Speed by 40.

Roger rapidly shoots twice, dealing 300 (+120% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage in total.
The first Hunter Net slows enemies by 80%. Lasts 1.5s.
The second one reduces Physical Defense of enemies by 10. Lasts 5s.
In Human form, Roger's Basic Attack slows enemies down by 20%. In wolf form, his Basic Attack deals extra damage that equals to 5% of enemies' lost HP (Up to 60 extra damage to Creeps).

Ruby has 5% Physical Lifesteal Effect on her own and inherits 125% Physical LIfesteal Effect from Equipment. (Her Basic Attack enjoys no lifesteal effect).

After any skill is cast, Ruby can jump to another place, increasing 16(+1.6*Hero Level) points of Physical and Magic Defense for a short period of time. (Effect scales with levels. Stacks up to 3 times and lasts 4s.

Ruby wields her giant scythe to attack twice. Every attack deals 60 (+55% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage, stunning enemies for 0.5s and slowly pulling them to her. Deals extra 20% damage to enemies in the outer ring.

Ruby quickly slashes her scythe forward, dealing 60 (+60% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. At the same time, she casts a shockwave forward, dealing 90 (+90% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s.
Ruby uses the scythe to attack in a wide range, dealing 205 (+180% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies, pulling them to her and stunning them for 0.5s.
Saber charges towards a designated place, dealing 80 (+40% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies along the way.
Saber attacks an enemy hero, knocking the target into the air for 1.2s, and then dealing 3 blows continuously. Each blow deals 200 (+130% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage.
Saber's damage reduces Physical Defense of enemies by 7 points. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 5s.

Saber shoots out 4 flying swords, with each sword dealing up to 160 (+90% Extra Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. Swords will spin around for awhile and then fly back to Saber.

Using Charge will call the swords back earlier. Swords also deal damage if they hit an enemy on their way back. This skill enjoys only 40% of Spell Vamp.

Selena can switch freely between her two forms.
Eleven Form:When using skills in her Eleven form Selena attaches Abyssal Mark. Stacks up to 2 times.When Abyssal TRap hits an enemy, it immediately adds an Abyssal Mark.
Abyssal Form: All damage will consume 1 of Abyssal Mark to deal 240-450 (+40% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage.

Selena fires magic arrows in a designated direction. The enemy hero hit first takes 250 (+20% Total Magic Power) to 500 (+% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and will be stunned for 0.5s-3s. Stun duration and damage increase with distance the arrows fly. 
The arrow absorbs Abyssal Traps as it travels to the target enemy, effects of Abysssal Traps will be inflicted to target enemy upon hit. If stunned an enemy for 1s or longer, Selena's Movement Speed will be increased by 40%. Lasts 2s.

Selena summons an Abyssal Devil to lurk in a designated location. The Abyssal Devil smothers a nearby enemy with its body. The enemy's Movement Speed is reduced by 70%. After 1s, this skill deals 400 (+150% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to the target and other nearby enemies, slows enemies for 1s by 50%. 
Selena can summon tp to 3 Abyssal Devils. For each Abyssal Devil, the final extra damage will increase by 50%.

Selena enters Abyssal Form and increases her Movement Speed by 30%. Lasts 0.8s. Immediately reset the CD of Soul Eater Garotte. 
Abyssal Form: Gain new skills. Her Basic Attack will deal extra (+25% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage.

Sun hurls his Golden Staff towards a designated direction, dealing 250 (+70% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies along its path. Heros and creeps that touch the Staff will be slowed for 2s. At that point, Sun will create a Doppleganger to attack the enemies. Dopplegangers enjoy 35% of Sun's attributes and last for 5s.

Sun and his Dopplegangers launch an instantenous attack against a designated enemy, dealing 180 (+60% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. Within 2.5s of casting this skill, Sun and his dopplegangers enjoy a 30% increase in Movement Speed.
Sun summons a Doppleganger that has 70% of his attributes. Dopplegangers take more damage, while each of their attacks recover Sun's HP by (+80% Total Physical ATK) points. Dopplegangers lasts 12s.
Physical Defense of enemies will be reduced by 6% when they take damage from Sun or his Dopplegangers. Stacks up to 10 times.

Terizla cracks the ground with his hammer and the fissure will spread out, dealing 300 (+80% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. Afte the fissure hits the first target, it will drill into the target and slow them by 30%. At the same time, Terizla's Movement Speed will be increased by 25%. Lasts 3s. The fissure on target will then explode, dealing 300 (+80% Total Physical ATK) and 20% points of Physical Damage of that enemy's lost HP.

Every 2% of Terizla's HP lost will be converted to 1% Damage Reduction (up to 40%).
Terizla's Attack Speed can not be increased. Per 1% extra Attack Speed will be transformed into 1 point of Physical Attack.

Terizla jumps to the designated area to smash down, causing 300 (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage and slowing enemies down by 55%. MEanwhile, he summons Scaffold, which will reach out a hook to the enemies and pull the target several times, causing 150 (+30% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage each time.

Terizla swings the hammer in sector area and releases his energy for 3 times continuously (Move the joystick to change the position while swinging). The first 2 times he will deal 180 (+150% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies. The 3rd time he will deal 225 (+300% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies and slow them by 15%. This slow effect can be stacked. Lasts 1.5s.

Thamuz tosses a pair of scythes to a designated direction. After travelling for a certain distance or hitting the first enemy hero, they deal 160 (+100% Total Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage. The scythes will then slow the enemies nearby 40% for a period of time, and deal 60 points of Physical Damage in every 0.5s. After a while, the scythes return to Thamuz, pulling enemies on the path. Thamuz can retrieve the scythes to reduce the next CD.

Thamuz jumps to a designated area to deal 250 (+80% Extra Physical Attack) points of Physical Damage and slow the enemy in 2s when landing. If the scythes are still travelling they will return to Thamuz.

Thamuz tosses Scythe to a designated direction. After traveling for a certain distance or hitting the first enemy hero, they deal 150 (+60% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. The Scythe will then slow nearby enemies by 30% for a period of time, and deal 45 (+20% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage in every 0.5s. 
After leaving Thamuz for a period of time or a certain distance, the Scythe will return to Thamuz.
Thamuz can approach the scythes to retrieve them.

Thamuz jumps to a designated area to deal 230 (+60% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage and slow the enemy units by 25% when landing. Lasts 2s.
If the scythes are still travelling, they will return to Thamuz and Molten Scythes will reset its CD instantly.

Thamuz spouts the lava stored within his body to deal 300 (+80% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies in nearby area and creates a cauterant atmosphere around him. The atmosphere lasts 9s and deals 20 (+5% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage every 0.5s. Thamuz recovers 3% HP when dealing damage with Basic Attack or scyhres when this skill is active. He gains an extra 22% Attack Speed when using Cauterant Inferno.

Thamuz inflicts a Scorch Effect when dealing damage to enemies, which deals 12 (+5% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies continuously. This effect can be stacked. Also, Thamuz moves 3 faster when he's not carrying his Scythe. Increases his own Movement Speed by 25% without Scythe. Retrieving the Scythe will strengthen his next Basic Attack to deal 100% points of damage, slowing targets by 30%, and generates a gush of lava beneath the target. This lava explodes in 2s, dealing 50 (+110% Total Physical ATK) points of True Damage.

Tigreal gains a layer of blessing when using skills or being hit by Basic Attacks (Those from minions are excluded). He gains immunity to the next Basic Attack after gaining 4 layers in total (Those from minions are excluded).
Tigreal fires an attack wave in a designated direction, dealing 300 (+80% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies and slowing them by 40% for 2s.

Tigreal thrusts his sword into the earth, pulling surrounding enemies to himself. Then he deals 270 (+130% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to them and stuns them for 1.5s. (This skill can be interrupted by transformation and airborne effects.)

Tigreal charges in a specified direction and collides with enemies, dealing (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage.

4s after the charge, Tigreal can use the skill again to launche a second attack, dealing 180 (+60% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage and knocking enemies into the air for 1s.

Uranus releases two energy spheres that orbit around him, dealing 125 (+30% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemy targets, while reducing their Physical Attack and Magic power by 15%, and thier Movement Speed by 30% for 2s.
Each time this skill deals damage to a target, the target will receive a stack of mark. Each stack increases the damage of this skill by 40%, 320% maximum. Each energy sphere only deals damage to the same target once.
Uranus absorbs the energy generated by attacks made against him to strengthen himself, regenerating 2-10 HP per second for each stack, over 10 seconds. This effect can be stacked up to 20 times.

Uranus charges towards the targeted direction, dealing 80 (+20% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies along the way, dealing 160 (+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies in this location and slowing them down by 25%. Meanwhile, Uranus generates an energy shield that absorbs up to 400 (+200% Total Magic Power) damage for 4s.
The shield explodes whne broken or at the end of its duration, dealing 300 (+150% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damageto enemies nearby.

Uranus unleashes energy stored within his body to remove the Slow Effect on himself and restore 200 points of HP immediately, while increases Movement Speed by 60% for 8s. (The speed gained decays over time).
Uranus directly acquires 5 stacks of Radiance, increasing 50% of the shield and Regen received by 8s, during which he can't be controlled.

Vale summons a windstorm in a designated area. After 1.5s, the windstorm will explode, dealing 800 (+160% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies in the area.
When leveling up, Vale can choose Damage Increase or Crowd Control to this skill.

When reaches lv. 4/6/8, he can enhance one of his skills and each skill can be enhanced once only. It can be chosen by players.

Vale gains a stack of Windtalk each time he kills or assists to kill an enemy. Each stack will increase 5 points of Movement Speed. Stacks up to 12 times.

Vale sends a whirlwind forward. Deals 410 (+120% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and slows enemies by 30% when the whirlwind hits an enemy unit. Lasts 2s.
When leveling up, Vale can choose to add Stop-on-Hit Effect or Knock-Airborne Effect to this skill.

Vale unleashes two wind blades towards the left and right of a designated area. Wind blades deals 230 (+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage.
When leveling up, Vale can choose to Damge Range Increase or Damage Increase to this skill.

Valir casts a fireball in a designated direction. The fireball will explode upon hitting an enemy target, dealing 280 (+80% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to enemies within the explosion range and slowing them by 40% for 1. Meanwhile, it ignites the ground along the way, which leads to an explosion after several seconds, dealing 140 (+40% Total Magic Power) Magic Damge to enemies within the area of effect.
Valir can stack the fireball up to 2 times. If the first target the fireball hits is an enemy hero, Valir will restoer a fireball at once.

Valir's skills ignite his targets ablaze, every second dealing Magic Damage equal to 0.6% of their Max HP. Lasts for 4s.
When blaze stacks 3 times on a target, it causes an explosion dealing Magic Damage equal to 8% of target's Max HP and stunning the target for 1s. (Within 7s, the same target can only be stunned by Valir's skills once.)

Valir removes all CC effects from him and surrounds himself with 4 Vengeance Flames, enhancing his Burst Fireball/Searing Torrent. This enhancement increases the skill damage by 30% for 9s. Meanwhile, increases his Movement Speed (decays with time) by 60% in 5s.

Valir unleashes a torrent of flames forward, knocking enemies back to the very end of its range and dealing 200 (+60% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to them.
After being enhanced by the Vengance Flame, the Searing Torrent will generate a fireball at the very end of its range that lasts 4s, dealing 100(+30% Total Magic Power) Magic Damage to nearby enemies each second.
The torrents of flames and fireall can slow enemies by 25% for 1s.

Vexana adds Necromancer to targets who take damage from her. Lassts 5s. While the spell lasts, the target will explode upon death, dealing 220-500 (+50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to surrounding units (Basic Damage increases with level).

Vexana summons puppets to attack enemies and will also add Necromancer on them.
Vexana unleashes phantom power forward, dealing 250 (+60% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage and fearing enemy heroes. Lasts 1s.

Vexana puts a curse on an enemy hero, dealing 250 (+80% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage. Curses the target continuously within 8s and deals 75 (+20% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage (It can't be Purified).
If a target dies while under the curse or the cur's duration comes to an end, Vexana will summon a puppet in the form of the target, which will follow her into battle. Puppets inherit 70% of the target's attributes, continously deal 5% of the puppet's Max HP as Magic Damage to surrounding enemies. Puppet lasts 20s.
Vexana summons a curse power to deal 500 (+200% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to a specified location.

Wanwan reveals the Vital of enemy Heroes hit by her hidden weapons. If she hits all vitals of the target, she will be able to deal 25% damage to the target.  Wanwan can move a short distance when she throws a Sleeve Dart. The speed of this movement scales with the attack speed.

Wanwan throws a Swallow Dart in a designated direction, dealing 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 / 270 / 300 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the path and triggering Tiger Pace. The Swallow Dart will transform into a Zone of Swallow Daggers at its destination. Lasts 5s.  Use Again: A Swallow Dagger returns to Wanwan, dealing 60 / 72 / 84 / 96 / 108 / 120 (+80% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to enemies along the way and reducing their Movement Speed by 60% for 0.5s. Wanwan can restore up to 3 Swallow Dagger(s) from the Zone.

Wanwan removes all CC from herself immediately and loses deadly throwing needles, dealing 200 / 220 / 240 / 260 / 280 / 300 (+60% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage to nearby enemies and reducing their Movement Speed by 40% for 1s.

Wanwan activates her crossbow and shoots arrows to enemies whose Vitals are all hit by her for 10 time(s). (Will shot 1 more time for every 40% extra Attack Speed). Each arrow deals 60 / 72 / 84 (+50% Total Physical Attack) Physical Damage and the last arrow will deal Crit Damage and trigger Tiger Pace. Crossbow of Tang can only be cast to enemies whose all vitals are hit.

X. Borg activates the flamethrower and fires in the chosen direction, dealing Damage continuously. Enemies whose tempeture rises to the limit will take True Damage.  Armorless State: X.Borg adjusts the flamethrower to narrow the gunfire coverage and extend the shooting range, reducing the damage of that in Armor State.

X.Borg activates the flamethrower and fires in the designated direction, dealing 40 (+50% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage for 2s. Enemies whose temperature rises to the limit will take True Damage and slow down by20%.
Armorless State: X.Borg adjusts the flamethrower to narrow angle and lengthen distance, reducing the damage to 60% of that in Armor State.

X.Borg shoots 6 Fire Stakes at the edge of the fan-shaped indictator. 1.2s later, the stakes are taken back into his body. Each stake deals 50 (+20% Total Physical ATK)Physical Damage to enemies in the path and pulls them back. If the Fire Stake touches the Firaga supplies in its path, it will take them back as well.
Armorless State: X.Borg adjusts the Fire Stake Launcher to send the stakes farther away and shortens the gap between the stakes.

X.Borg's Firaga Armor inherits 30% of his Max HP and takes all damage for X.Borg while it's active. When the Armor runs out of HP, X.Borg will do a roll to the direction of the Left Joystick to disengage from the Armor. X.Borg won't take any damage in this duration. He then continues to restore energy in Armorless State. When energy is full, X.Borg will re-equip the Armor and restore the Armor to 30% of his Max HP.
X.Borg's fire damage causes enemies to arm up, and enemies with highest tmperature will drop Firaga supplies when they take flame damage. Pick up supplies and restore Armor, ore restore energy while in Armorless State.

X.Borg charges forward in a designated direction, shooting fire around to deal 200 (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage and slowing enemies by 25%. If he hits an enemy hero during the charge, he will stop charging and slow the target by extra 40%. The whole process lasts 3s. Then he self-explodes to cause 400 and 15% of True Damage of target's Max HP. The explosion destroys the current Firaga Armor and deals 50% damag and puts himself under the Armorless State, where this skill cannot be used.
He can move again according to the direction of Joystick after he self-explodes.
Use Again: End the falme spray and self-explode right away.
Yi Sun-shin summons the naval fleet to launch 3 waves of rocket attacks. Each wave deals 165 (35% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage and will also slow enemies slightly.

Yi Sun-shin chooses his longbow or glaive to attack according to his distance from his enemies. Using the glaive to attack will deal more damage and reduce the CD of One-wave Sweep by 1s.

A navy fleet will be summoned at the allied Base to strengthen it. Yi Sun-shin can board the Turtle Ship beside the base periodically and get buffs.

Yi Sun-shin shoots a piercing arrow at full strength, dealing 160 (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies as well as slowing them by 40%. Lasts 2s.
The arrow's attack range and damage scale with charge time. The first enemy takes full damage, the next one takes 20% less (up to 60% less damage). When charging, his Movement Speed will be reduced slightly.

With glaive in hand, Yi Sun-shin slashes forward, dealing 160 (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to enemies along the way and slowing them by 30% for 2s.

When Yi Sun-shin is on his Turtle Ship, the ship will dash in the designated direction, dealing 200 (+100% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage to the first enemy it collides with and enemies nearby, stunning them for 1.5s.
Upon death, Zhask commands a Nightmaric Spawn, to self-explode with him, dealing 500 (+100% Total Magic Power) points of True Damage to enemies nearby.

Zhask fires penetrating mental missle in the designated direction, dealing 370 (+100% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies along the way, after which Nightmaric Spawn will cast Mind Eater once. IF both of them hit the same target, then the target will be stunned for 0.5s.

Fusion Enhanced: The damage of Zhask and Nightmaric Spawn is fused together, dealing 640 (+180% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage.

Zhask substantially enhances the power of Nightmeric Spawn, increasing all its attributes. The enhance increases as skill levels up. 

Use Again: Zhask immediately gets off Nightmeric Spawn and loses enhancement.

Zhask summons a Nightmaric Spawn, in the designated location. Nightmaric Spawn cannot move but will automatically attack nearby enemies. Every 2 Basic Attacks launch Death Ray at a target, slowing those who are hit continuously for a short time.
Nightmaric Spawn will enjoy 70% of Zhask's attributes. If Zhask is too far away from Nightmaric Spawn, it will disappear.

Zhask releases a swarm of Nightmeric Clones in the targeted direction. The clones will explode and deal 140 (+50% Total Magic Power) points of Magic Damage to enemies on contact, reducing their Movement Speed by 80%. Lasts 1s.

If Nightmeric Clones find no target, they will burrow into the ground and ambush enemies passing by.

Fusion Enhanced: Zhask releases several swarms of Nightmeric Clones

Every 6s, Zilong's next Basic Attack will land a combo on the target in front of him for multiple times, dealing a total of 1.8x Basic Attack damage. Hitting enemies with a Basic Attack will reduce the CD of Passive by 0.5s.
Zilong dashes toward the target, dealing 260 (+30% Total Physical ATK) points of Physical Damage. Then he performs a quick Basic Attack immediately.
Zilong lifts an enemy over his back, dealing 300 (+140% Total Physical ATK) Physical Damage and reducing the target's Physical Defense by 10 for 2s.
Zilong increases his Movement Speed by 30% and Attack Speed by 45%, becoming immune to Slowing Effect for 6s. Removes Debuffs upon casting.
